definition: to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]

sentences.english: What follows from that is up to the diplomats to deal with.
sentences.chinese: 在那之后，就全由外交官来处理了。

sentences.english: He started his official career as a diplomat.
sentences.chinese: 他从当外交官起开始了他的从政生涯。

sentences.english: The fortune of the young diplomat began to wane.
sentences.chinese: 这位年轻外交官开始倒运了。

sentences.english: Foreign dignitaries and diplomats will sit in the South Transept which is directly to the side.
sentences.chinese: 外国政要和外交官将坐在婚礼高坛的正南方。

sentences.english: The worst offender isQatar, according to several Tripoli-based diplomats.
sentences.chinese: 一些驻黎波里的外交官则最担心卡塔尔的立场。

sentences.english: The only problem is that Ambassador Daalder fails to turn up.
sentences.chinese: 唯一的问题外交官Daalder没能出现。

sentences.english: Lahore police say the U. S. diplomat was taken to a police facility and an investigation is under way.
sentences.chinese: 拉合尔市警方说，这名美国外交官被带到警察部门。

sentences.english: Dear friend stations, please do diplomatic work of blessing in this edition.
sentences.chinese: 各友家外交官请于本版内进行节日祝福外交工作。

sentences.english: His welltested skills as a diplomat may be particularly valuable.
sentences.chinese: 他作为外交官的久经考验的技能可能尤为重要。

sentences.english: The Norwegian Foreign Ministry summoned Iran's envoy (charge d'affaires) in Oslo to protest the action.
sentences.chinese: 挪威外交部召见伊朗驻奥斯陆外交官提出抗议。

sentences.english: He was China's most widely traveled senior diplomat.
sentences.chinese: 他是中国游历最广的一名高级外交官。

sentences.english: Fearey had all the charm and urbanity of the trained diplomat .
sentences.chinese: 费尔里具备一个训练有素的外交官的一切风度和优雅。

sentences.english: But I did not remain a diplomat.
sentences.chinese: 但我没有一直做外交官。

sentences.english: Diplomats predicted the talks could continue into next week.
sentences.chinese: 外交官预测，会谈可能会一直持续到下周。

sentences.english: To what level can Chinese public security personnel use force against diplomats?
sentences.chinese: 中方公安人员是否有权对外交官使用武力？

sentences.english: Some Japanese diplomats fret that China'sCommunist Party may not have full control over the military.
sentences.chinese: 一些日本外交官担心中共也许无法完全掌控军队。

definition: Ministry of Foreign Affairs/foreign office/Dept. of State
Foreign Secretary/(UK) Secretary of State for Foreign and Commonwealth Affairs
minister/diplomat performing ambassadorial role in Qing times, before regular diplomatic relations
